layout.name: allowjump
layout.title: Allow Jumping Out
layout.tooltip: If checked, the player can jump ot of the minecart by pressing jump

layout.name: scanPlayer
layout.title: Allow Players
layout.tooltip: If checked, the wormhole will scan for players to be warped

layout.name: scanNPC
layout.title: Allow NPCs
layout.tooltip: If checked, the wormhole will scan for NPCs to be warped

layout.name: scanBlock
layout.title: Allow Blocks
layout.tooltip: If checked, the wormhole will scan for blocks to be warped
